name: Bridge Crossing
description:
BRIDGE CROSSING

Cross a wide bridge in search of your lost sheep

Gameplay
Walk through limited space to dodge cannonballs and wild boars


Unlock and use skills that will help you dodge projectiles!
Dash:

Greater agility in your movement

Intangible:

Become momentarily invulnerable to projectiles

Shield:


Use a powerful barrier to pass through a large amount of projectiles
Bridge Crossing is an indie 2D pixel art game about a shepherd who must rescue his lost sheep from a war-torn bridge. You'll need intelligence, skill and courage to face the obstacles on your way, each stage representing a segment of the bridge under cannon fire. You'll also have to avoid collisions with other animals fleeing the chaos. The game combines puzzle and action elements. Can you save your sheep and make it back home? Test your limits in Bridge Crossing, an exciting and fun game!
